mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_submission (id_program, id_exam, id_student, id_file, submit_time, exam_status) VALUES (#{idProgram}, #{idExam}, #{idStudent}, #{idFile}, now(),'제출완료')
mapper.select: SELECT s.id_student as idStudent, s.name as studentName, es.exam_status as status, es.submit_time as submitTime, f.data as data, f.file_name as fileName, es.id_file as idFile FROM attendance a JOIN student s ON a.id_student = s.id_student LEFT JOIN exam_submission es ON s.id_student = es.id_student AND es.id_exam = #{idExam} LEFT JOIN file f ON es.id_file = f.id_file WHERE a.id_pgm = #{idProgram};
